title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Concept Mapping-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Complex Language Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in foundational language education design theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: In solving complex language problems, learners use concept mapping tools to map relationships between core elements with 80% accuracy.
Through team-based concept mapping activities, learners incorporate peer feedback and revise design proposals at least three times.
As a final output, learners submit visual concept maps and action plans for language education design problems with 100% completion.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
